duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as an inspiring coach and mentor to the sales development team, providing continuous coaching to increase individual and team effectiveness & productivity.
Work closely with the team to ensure each member consistently meets and overachieves their quota through candid feedback, weekly 1:1 meetings, and developing trusting relationships.
Analyze top-of-the-funnel metrics, meeting & pipeline quality, and revenue impact across the segments supported to drive the execution and achievement of pipeline coverage goals.

Partner & align with Sales Leadership, Marketing, RevOps, Enablement, and Product Marketing on the planning, execution, and success of campaigns & field events, exceeding pipeline targets and ensuring the team masters their understanding of the buyers and the company message.
Attract, hire, train, and retain top-tier sales development talent, producing high-performing team members and building them as the next tier of top-performing Account Executives.
Lead by example, being a source of knowledge & skill on new & emerging prospecting trends that the team can learn and apply.
Produce and execute comprehensive strategies to enhance sales development performance and achieve set goals.
Provide tactical management of reps and shadowing/coaching of calls & written outreach on a daily basis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
